page.title: 17LEISURE
page.content: In my spare time I ride my bike. It is a red Suziki ER 50. It has five gears and it goes very fast. I also male aeroplanes. The one I am working on at the moment is the Senator. My friend and I also enjoy designing and making our own gliders and powered aeroplanes. I take my dog out for a walk and sometimes I go horseriding. I enjoy riding because we can canter over the Winterhills. I sometimes go swimming at the leisure centre and go down the slide. When the waves start I go down to the deep end with my air bed. My friend Andy and I like playing with Technical Lego. We make all sorts of things from cars to houses. I sometimes play on my home computer. My favourite game is Horace Goes Skiing.
